programme.desc: Unsolved Mysteries with Robert Stack, S08E09, This episode includes: Taunting Bank Robber, Merchant Student Drowning & UD, Genius Mystery, Baby Given Away and Mia Zapata & UD.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E02, With access to the San Francisco Police Department's work, including saliva samples taken from letters the infamous Zodiac Killer sent 30 years ago, we reevaluate the case of the serial killer who began terrorizing California in the late 1960s.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E03, While hiking with husband Dennis in Montana, Leslee Larson fell into Wolf Creek. Then Dennis is convicted of murdering his wife, while in Main. And 15-year-old papergirl Penny Parker goes missing, then her body is found by a search volunteer.

programme.title: The Merry Widow (#53)/The Missing Informant (#15)
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E04, In 1983, Navy seamen Sonny Grotton left base for a long weekend at home. But as he pulled into his driveway, a gunman killed him. And in 1993, former state trooper Doug Wright claimed his estranged wife shot and killed herself in their home.

programme.title: The Original Nightstalker
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E05, In the 1980s, a serial killer prowled the posh streets of Orange County. Police were unaware of the serial attacks until 1996, when DNA revealed the killer's secret and they linked four murders to a single DNA profile.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E06, The murder of a 73-year-old man leads police on a long chase for a man who's suspected of identity theft and bears a rose tattoo with the name "Phyllis".

programme.title: Green River Killer/Missing And The Dead
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E13, In 1982 and '83, Seattle's Green River Killer stalked prostitutes like game. With 49 victims, he could be the deadliest serial killer in U.S. history. Then, a passing motorist spots a fire along a road in South Carolina and calls it in.

programme.title: Hitchhike To Murder / In The Care Of A Killer
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E15, Police must wait nearly 30 years before advances in DNA technology give them the chance to convict the killer of a young hitchhiker, and Philadelphia police wage a 16-year hunt for the man who raped and killed a 10-year-old girl.

programme.title: Blood Money/Precious Doe
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E20, Testimony about the growth of larvae in dead bodies helps convict the man who stabbed a couple to death and strangled their 4-year-old daughter in 1993.

programme.title: Danny Bible/License To Kill
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E21, A Texas woman's murder is finally solved when the killer's plan to kill a second woman and stuff her into a duffel bag goes awry.

programme.title: Bump In The Night/Hitchhike To Murder
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E24, A woman who takes down the license plate number of a car that had been following her helps police solve the murder of another young woman.

programme.title: Mistaken for a Killer/The Boy and the Monster
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E27, Advances in DNA technology that take place over 20 years help police to finally identify the man who brutally stabbed two women to death.

programme.title: Daddy Knows Best/Operation Jambalaya
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S03E3005, A detective works for 15 years to nab a man who murdered and dismembered his wife to hide the sexual abuse of his children. Then, 20 years after the shooting murder of a gas station attendant, detectives get a lead.

programme.title: Kidnapped
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E01, A kidnapper grabs 8-year-old Chad Choice from his home in Texas, then torments his parents with two ransom demands. The case goes cold until the parents receive a chilling package in the mail that contains a letter--and a skull.

programme.title: The Shopping Cart Killer
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E03, A dry cleaning tag inside a sweatshirt left at a crime scene helps police track down a serial killer and rapist who had been eluding them for years.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E09, When a Nevada couple demands the return of a baby they had sold to another couple, the burned body of the baby turns up in Arizona. Then, a man discovers a barrel in his crawlspace that contains the body of a woman who has been dead for decades.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E10, A forensic dentist helps police nab a child killer by showing that the teeth marks on the killer's arms match the teeth of the murdered boy. And telltale blood stains on a blue bandana solve the 10-year-old case of a teenage girl murdered.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classics
programme.desc: Cold Case Files Classic, S04E11, Police in Overland Park, Kansas, hunt for over 15 years for a serial killer who lures women to Kansas for sadomasochistic sexual trysts at hotels.

MST3K: Robot Holocaust, 19900113000000 +0000, After the ninth chapter of Radar Men From The Moon (1952) ends in technical difficulties, Joel and the bots must endure Robot Holocaust (1986). They pretend to be characters from the movie, but Tom Servo is the only one who is into it.

MST3K: Robot Monster: MST3K: Robot Monster, 19891223080000 +0000, The guys watch a post-apocalyptic film about aliens and robots, riff on two more installments of "Radar Men from the Moon", and try to understand surrealism.
MST3K: Santa Claus Conquers The Martians, 19911221000000 +0000, Martians abduct Santa Claus and two human children in hopes of bringing Christmas to their planet.

Side Hackers, 19900928000000 +0000, A motorcycle racer and a violent stunt rider start a war of vengeance against each other. Joel and the Bots write a song inspired by the movie and chat with a few characters from the film on the Hexfield.

MST3K: Star Force: Fugitive Alien II, 19911116000000 +0000, Ken and the crew of the Bacchus 3 return in Star Force: Fugitive Alien II (1987) while Joel and the Bots make a Captain Joe action figure and stage a "name that puppet" quiz show.
MST3K: Teen-Age Strangler, 19931107000000 +0000, Mike and the 'bots watch the dreary educational short Is This Love? (1957) and the horrifyingly bad Teenage Strangler (1964).
MST3K: Teenage Caveman, 19911109000000 +0000, In Teenage Cave Man (1958), a rebellious cave boy goes against clan rules and wants to explore horizons beyond the river

MST3K: Teenagers From Outer Space, 19920626000000 +0000, A group of aliens land on Earth and decide to use the planet as a farm for their livestock. One of the aliens rebels and flees to a small town, where he is pursued by another alien who kills anyone in his path.

MST3K: The Amazing Transparent Man, 19950318000000 +0000, During the feature film The Amazing Transparent Man (1960), a mad scientist makes an escaped criminal invisible so he can steal radioactive supplies.

programme.title: The Truth About Lies
programme.desc: Good Witch, S01E05, Hallmark Original Series. Cassie's magic can't keep her away from Abigail's scheming.

programme.title: The Storm
programme.desc: Good Witch, S01E06, Hallmark Original Series. A blizzard threatens disaster in Middleton.

programme.title: Together We Stand...
programme.desc: Good Witch, S01E07, Hallmark Original Series. The winter storm continues to pose a threat to all of Middleton.

programme.title: True Colors
programme.desc: Good Witch, S01E08, Hallmark Original Series. Middleton's enchanting "Good Witch" Cassie receives devastating news.

programme.title: Second Time Around
programme.desc: Good Witch, S02E01, Hallmark Original Series. Sam's ex-wife Linda threatens to come between them.

programme.title: Driven
programme.desc: Good Witch, S02E02, Hallmark Original Series. The arrival of a man from Cassie's past may complicate her relationship.

programme.title: The Dance
programme.desc: When Calls the Heart, S01E05, Hallmark Original Series. Abigail takes in a very pregnant widow Carla Noonan to keep an eye on her.

programme.title: These Games
programme.desc: When Calls the Heart, S01E06, Hallmark Original Series. Elizabeth is feeling caught between overprotective Jack and new miner Billy.

programme.title: Second Chances
programme.desc: When Calls the Heart, S01E07, Hallmark Original Series. Abigail is encouraged to re-open Coal Valley's dilapidated and abandoned cafe.

programme.title: Perils of the Soloists
programme.desc: When Calls the Heart, S01E08, Hallmark Original Series. Elizabeth and Abigail emotionally move out of the row house.
The Boys Next Door, 19960204000000 +0000, Four mentally handicapped adult men and their burned out social worker who must break the news that he is leaving.

While You Were Dating, 20170212000000 +0000, A divorced couple meet online and end up going on a blind date together. After an awkward reunion, they decide to set each other up with their friends, but old habits never quite die. Stars Billy Baldwin and Stefanie VonPfetten.

Kiss at Pine Lake, 20120519000000 +0000, Luke Garvey buys his uncle's Camp Pine Lake only to find himself the owner of a sinking business. Zoe McConnell, Luke's girlfriend from years ago, wants him to sell until an old flame is rekindled.

programme.title: Red Sky
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S05E05, The SG-1 team is welcomed on K'Tau by the planet's religious leader, who takes the reddening sky concurrent with their arrival as a sign from their gods. What he doesn't know is that the reddish color is signaling the planet's impending doom!

programme.title: Rite Of Passage
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S05E06, On the eve of her birthday, Cassandra is showing signs of mind fire, a powerful electromagnetic field triggered at puberty. Now SG-1 must find a cure to stop the life-threatening changes before she destroys herself…and the command center!

programme.title: Beast Of Burden
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S05E07, Daniel's Unas friend, Chaka (Dion Johnstone), is captured by a pre-industrial civilization that uses Unas as slaves. While attempting to free Chaka from this cruel regime, Daniel risks the safety of SG-1, and possibly the life of his friend.

programme.title: The Tomb
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S05E08, On a rescue mission to recover Russian soldiers believed missing in action on a previously undisclosed trip, the SG-1 team gets trapped in a Goa'uld tomb with a number of decomposed bodies…and a deadly alien monster with an appetite for human flesh!

programme.title: Between Two Fires
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S05E09, The SG-1 team returns to Tollana for the funeral of Chancellor Omoc, only to discover the rulers have reversed their policy on technology sharing and will now trade advanced weaponry with Earth. But is there a secret agenda behind the gesture?

Stargate SG-1, S05E10, SG-1 discover an opportunity to form an alliance with an advanced race who are willing to share their technology. They are the Aschen, the danger of whom the future SG-1 team warned about. Will the truth be revealed before it is too late?

programme.title: Desperate Measures
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S05E11, When Major Carter is abducted by a reclusive billionaire with nefarious plans that threaten her life, O'Neill and the rest of the SG-1 team must work with an old adversary to solve the mystery of her disappearance and bring her back alive!

programme.title: Wormhole X-Treme!
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S05E12, A ship headed for Earth is linked to the pod found through the alien Martin. Investigating what he knows, SG-1 finds Martin has become a consultant on a sci-fi series called Wormhole X-treme!, with a plot uncannily like the Stargate program!

programme.title: Proving Ground
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S05E13, Col. Jack O'Neill (Richard Dean Anderson) and his new SG recruits have become the targets of a secret hostile takeover. Now it's up to a wounded O'Neill and his neophyte troop to save the command center from a possible alien invasion!

programme.title: 48 Hours
programme.desc: Stargate SG-1, S05E14, During a pursuit by the Goa'uld gliders, Teal'c fails to make it through the Stargate before it is destroyed. Now SG-1 has only 48 hours to reestablish Teal'c's energy signature from the temporary memory of the Stargate before it's erased…for good!

programme.title: Rising (Part 1)
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S01E01, A new Stargate team, lead by Dr. Elizabeth Weir (Torri Higginson) embarks on a dangerous mission to a distant galaxy , where they discover the mythical lost city of Atlantis -- and a deadly new enemy that feeds on human fear. Part 1 of 2.

programme.title: Rising (Part 2)
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S01E02, A new Stargate team, lead by Dr. Elizabeth Weir (Torri Higginson) embarks on a dangerous mission to a distant galaxy, where they discover the mythical lost city of Atlantis -- and a deadly new enemy. Part 2 of 2.

programme.title: Hide And Seek
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S01E03, McKay (David Hewlett) volunteers to be the first to try Beckett's (Paul McGillion) newest ATA gene therapy. But things go wrong when the device cannot be removed, and is stopping Dr. McKay from being able to eat or drink and endangering his life.

programme.title: Thirty Eight Minutes
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S01E04, The Stargate team must rush to save Major John Sheppard (Joe Flanigan) after he becomes lodged in the Stargate, with only 38 minutes until the gate automatically disengages, and Sheppard is expelled into space, where he will surely asphyxiate.

programme.title: Suspicion
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S01E05, After several attacks by the Wraiths, Dr. Elizabeth Weir contemplates if there is a spy among the team, with all signs pointing to Teyla. Feeling betrayed by the team's suspicions, the Athosians move to a newly discovered land.

programme.title: Childhood's End
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S01E06, Sheppard (Joe Flanigan), Dr. Weir (Torri Higginson), and the rest of the team visit a new planet, M7G-677, where no one is older than 24 thanks to a ritual suicide that the citizens believe is keeping the Wraith at bay.

programme.title: Poisoning The Well
programme.desc: Stargate Atlantis, S01E07, While on the planet Hoff, Dr. Beckett strives to help the Hoffans who are working on a vaccine against the Wraith. Despite the advice against taking the vaccine due to the threat of violence and high death rate, the Hoffans take the risk.

programme.title: Confession
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S09E06, Kelly decides to help Leah and her daughter skip town and assume a new identity. Valerie elects to throw a massive rave as a farewell party before turning herself in to the police.

programme.title: You Say Goodbye, I Say Hello
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S09E07, As Kelly and Valerie pack Brandon's belongings for shipment, Kelly discovers a letter in which Val advised Brandon not to marry her. She turns everyone against Val and gets them to boycott her Thanksgiving gathering.

programme.title: I'm Back Because
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S09E08, David is arrested for statutory rape and gets suspended from his radio show. Steve bristles at the news that his mother is dating her much younger co-star. Kelly's reaction to Dylan's return worries Matt.

programme.title: The Following Options
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S09E09, Kelly grows angry with Matt when he takes a case defending a tobacco company. Donna agrees to let a troubled fifteen-year-old girl buy a dress on layaway. Dylan takes his bullet-riddled Porsche out of storage.

programme.title: Marathon Man
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S09E10, Dylan takes Kelly to Mexico for a day and buys her a gift, but Kelly rejects him to focus on her relationship with Matt. Dylan soon takes Gina to Mexico and buys her the same gift.

programme.title: Trials and Tribulations
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S09E12, Dissatisfied customers take Steve to court, and wind up on TV; Gina continues to care for Dylan, who is arrested; Donna and Noah struggle to find a place to be alone; David has to back up his lie to Gertrude; Kelly second-guesses herself with Matt.

programme.title: Beheading St. Valentine
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S09E15, Lauren moves into the Walsh house; Steve's idea for his paper leads to an alert about a potential health problem; Donna agrees to pose as David's girlfriend at a business function; Gina worries she can't keep pace with Dylan.

programme.title: Slipping Away
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S09E17, Kelly and Dylan agree to go to Mexico and obtain medication for Lauren. Donna agrees to a date with the persistent David. Gina discovers that her mother spent most of the money she earned skating as a minor.

programme.title: Bobbi Dearest
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S09E18, Gina decides to sue Felice for $1.1 million. Donna, torn apart by her family's bickering, runs crying to Noah. Matt learns that Lauren has filed for divorce. Dylan nearly dies in a Jet Ski accident.

programme.title: The Leprechaun
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S09E19, Noah faces foreclosure after failing to make his mortgage payments on the Peach Pit/After Dark building. Steve has a man dress up as a leprechaun and promises a "pot of gold" to the person who catches him.

programme.title: Fortune Cookie
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S09E20, Dylan's friendly gift to Kelly upsets Gina; Steve is unnerved by a psychic's bitter prediction; David and Claudia lay the groundwork for their faux marriage; a high-school nemesis asks for Donna's help; Matt prepares to advertise on TV.

programme.title: Local Hero
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S09E22, Kelly and Dylan subdue a man who tries to attack a pregnant woman and her child. Gina receives an offer to become a skating commentator. Noah reveals that he has a half-sister, who is working at a nearby diner.

programme.title: End of the World As We Know It
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S09E23, Noah's father's company is sued by Matt; Katie moves forward with David; a nannycam catches Matt and Kelly making love; Steve goes Y2Krazy, ignoring - or avoiding - a trip with Janet; a model makes a play for Donna.

programme.title: Agony
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S09E25, Kelly receives medical treatment and files a police report. Matt helps a thief gain his release through a technicality. Although Dylan warns that she is still fragile, David asks Gina on a date.

programme.title: The Phantom Menace
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S10E01, Kelly is arrested and held overnight until the shooting is ruled a justifiable homicide. David asks Dylan to move out. Wayne annoys Donna with his cavalier attitude, particularly when he fails to show sensitivity toward Kelly.

programme.title: A Fine Mess
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S10E04, Steve buys an engagement ring and practices proposals, often with Noah assuming the role of Janet. Dylan grows tired of living with Gina and suggests that she find her own place. David's radio show becomes popular due to his abrasive tactics.

programme.title: The Loo-Ouch
programme.desc: Beverly Hills 90210, S10E05, Steve and Janet announce the pregnancy and engagement to her parents, who respond by calling Janet a disgrace. Matt and Noah each offer to move out so that Steve can move Janet and the baby into the house.

programme.title: Runaway Car/Snowgirl
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E168, Young children left alone in the car accidentally release the gears shift and the car rolls. A 3-year-old sneaks out in the snow.

programme.title: Snowmobile/Storm Drain Girl
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E195, A man is critically injured when he is thrown from his snowmobile. A storm sweeping through Houston drags a 7-year-old girl into drainpipes.

programme.title: Loggers Baby/Church Bus
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E199, Loggers returning home find a newborn wrapped in a baby blanket in the woods.

programme.title: Hurt Highway LT/Garage Door Fire
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E238, An officer directing traffic around an accident is hit by a car. A four-year-old is trapped in the garage when a fire breaks out in the laundry room next to it.

programme.title: Horseback Havoc/Winter Pool Baby
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E217, A teenager horseback riding when his horse suddenly veers throwing him into a tree. A 20-month-old boy is found at the bottom of the swimming pool.

programme.title: Supermarket Hostage/Grapevine Fall
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E230, A stock boy is held hostage in a grocery store robbery. A teen is swinging on a large vine over a gorge when snaps and he falls 60 feet.

programme.title: Date Rape/Freezer Tongue
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E145, After being sexually assaulted and stabbed, a young woman calls 911/ A teen babysitter gets his tongue caught on the bottom of the freezer and needs to call 911

programme.title: Christina’s Call/Penny Choke
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E350, A 7-year old girl calls 911 when the father begins to attack her mother. A man helps save his 11-month old nephew who is choking.

programme.title: Terror in the Sky
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E198, A Pilot collapses over the control board of his plane. His wife sends out a Mayday.

programme.title: Double Hero Down
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E148, While attempting to rescue a hang glider, a volunteer firefighter accidentally gets knocked down a ravine.

programme.title: Felon Follow/Cannon Ball Kid
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E132, While returning home, a couple follows a suspicious van that turns out to be bank robbers/18-year-old dives into a shallow pool, and upon hitting his head on the bottom becomes immediately paralyzed.

programme.title: Balcony Fall/Bank Capture
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E208, Teen sneaking out to party falls from a fourth-floor balcony. A teller is able to call 911 during a bank robbery.

programme.title: Twin Drowning/Oklahoma Cops Docu
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E232, A 6-year-old finds his twin baby brothers face down in the plastic cover of the family's swimming pool. Ride along with Oklahoma City Police Dept.

programme.title: African Croc/11 Yr Old Road
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E331, A boy on a safari is attacked by an alligator while swimming. An 11-year-old takes over driving when her mother loses consciousness.

programme.title: Circling Boat/Where’s My Wife?
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E324, A family is tossed in the water when their boat hits a wake. A woman is thrown from her car when it plunges down a 75-feet embankment.

programme.title: Cave Save
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E187, A man losses control of his rappel and plunge 239 feet to the bottom.

programme.title: Denver Chopper
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E138, A television helicopter crew follows a police chase.

programme.title: Wing Walker/Steph Saves Mom
programme.desc: Rescue 911, S01E101, Flight wing walker finds himself dangling from a steel safety line. 5-year-old calls 911 for her mother

programme.title: Feed Bin Boy/Rescuers Rescue

Rebirth of Mothra 2, 19971213000000 +0000, Two young kids inadvertently unleash a giant sea creature which is strengthened from the abundance of modern-day pollution. Mothra's keepers, the tiny twins Moll and Lora, quickly rouse the gentle giant in order to combat this latest threat to peace.

Rebirth of Mothra 3, 19981212000000 +0000, In the final film in the new 'Mothra' trilogy, King Ghidorah, the most destructive of all the monsters, returns to destroy the Earth. In the end, Mothra is indeed triumphant and takes her place among the greatest of all monsters.

programme.title: Baja Run
programme.desc: Baywatch, S05E04, John Cort shows up at headquarters and convinces Mitch to compete in the Baja Run dune buggy race with him. What Mitch doesn’t know is Cort is keeping a secret which could land them both in a Mexican prison.

programme.title: Air Buchannon
programme.desc: Baywatch, S05E05, Mitch has to work a 24-hour shift with Stephanie and entrusts Hobie with the responsibility of taking care of himself during that time. But Hobie becomes infatuated with an older girl and is pressured into throwing a party without Mitch’s knowledge.

programme.title: Shortsighted
programme.desc: Baywatch, S05E06, Carter McKay has recently moved to Southern California to live with his father after his mother's death. When Hobie invites him to the annual father/son lifeguard competition Hobie learns the reason Carter is so embarrassed by his father.

programme.title: Someone to Baywatch Over Your
programme.desc: Baywatch, S05E07, When a woman Mitch refers to as “The Mermaid” turns out to be the wife of a crime boss, an FBI agent comes to catch him before he can escape the country. Things become complicated when Mitch and the catty FBI Agent butt heads.

programme.title: K-Gas The Grooveyard of Solid Gold
programme.desc: Baywatch, S05E08, The beach descends into chaos when DJ Larry "Loomin" Large announces a beach wide treasure hunt for a gold pirate doubloon worth $100,000. The Baywatch team is put on high alert when thousands of reckless treasure hunters storm the beach.

programme.title: Red Wind
programme.desc: Baywatch, S05E09, When the hot Santa Ana winds move in from the desert, things start heating up on the Baywatch beach in more ways than one, as it seems like all the “weirdos” in the world have been blown to the beach.

programme.title: I Spike
programme.desc: Baywatch, S05E10, Tracy, a lifeguard-turned-hovercraft expert, arrives at Baywatch to demonstrate the benefits of the new rescue vehicle. Meanwhile, The National Pro Beach Volleyball Tour arrives, reigniting Matt's desire to be a professional beach volleyball star.

programme.title: Silent Night Baywatch Night, Part 1
programme.desc: Baywatch, S05E11, Matt and Hobie rescue a young boy who is being harassed by a thug and take care of him until they can get him to his mother, but he seems to be hiding a deep dark secret. Meanwhile, CJ falls for a handsome young man who turns out to be taboo.

programme.title: Silent Night Baywatch Night, Part 2
programme.desc: Baywatch, S05E12, Joey joins Mitch and Hobie in decorating for Christmas. CJ has a great time working with Father Ryan but starts to worry that he may misinterpret her warmth as flirting, and that he may be considering quitting the priesthood for her.

programme.title: Rubber Ducky
programme.desc: Baywatch, S05E13, Logan's visa is soon to expire, and he will be sent back to Australia unless he gets a green card. He plans on earning the money to purchase one in an upcoming boat race. Meanwhile Mitch’s mother visits.

programme.title: Homecoming
programme.desc: Baywatch, S05E14, Stephanie is kidnapped by an eco-terrorist. The Baywatch team must stop the terrorist before she blows up an oil rig with Stephanie constrained inside it!

programme.title: Seize the Day
programme.desc: Baywatch, S05E15, Mitch proposes to Tracy, but the happy moment is short-lived as she reveals she has a terminal illness. With the team being short-staffed it is up to Logan and Caroline to deal with reckless wave runners.

programme.title: A Little Help From My Friends
programme.desc: Baywatch, S05E16, Mitch is still mourning Tracy’s death, so Hobie seeks help from a radio show to help Mitch recover. Caroline resuscitates a man with AIDS, which puts a strain on her relationship with Logan. And CJ enters a ballroom dancing competition.

programme.title: Father's Day
programme.desc: Baywatch, S05E17, Mitch receives a mysterious package his father had put together before he died. Mitch and his father never saw eye-to-eye, but this gift impacts Mitch more than he ever thought possible. Logan visits a hypnotist to deal with a past trauma.

programme.title: Fire With Fire
programme.desc: Baywatch, S05E18, Andy, an old friend of Mitch, visits Baywatch to complete four days of lifeguard service in order to remain on the active roster. But Andy's strong-arm tactics do not sit well with the other lifeguards.

programme.title: Deep Trouble
programme.desc: Baywatch, S05E19, Matt and CJ stumble upon a homeless man who shockingly turns out to be someone they know very well. Meanwhile, Mitch must rescue a boy's brother from drug smugglers so the boy can receive a life-saving transplant of his brother's bone marrow.

programme.title: Promised Land
programme.desc: Baywatch, S05E20, When testing out a new flying machine, Mitch spots a makeshift raft with a stranded woman in it. Mitch must help the Chinese woman find her sister. Back at headquarters, Matt and Garner deal with a beach robbery scam.
